title: Thinking Out Loud
lyrics:
[intro] (C)  (Am)  (F)  (G)
 
(C) (Am)When your legs don't work like they (F)used to before (G)
(C) (Am)And I can't sweep you off of your (F)feet (G)
(C) (Am)Will your mouth still remember the (F)taste of my love (G)                
(C) (Am)Will your eyes still smile from your (F)cheeks (G)
                
And darling I (C) (Am)will be loving you (F) (G)'til we're seventy (C)  (Am)   (F)   (G)
And baby my (C) (Am)heart could still fall (F) as (G)hard at twenty-(C)three (Am) 
(F) And I'm thinking (G)'bout how
 
(Dm)People fall in love in mys(G)terious (C)ways
(Dm)Maybe just the touch of a (G)hand
Well (Dm)me I fall in love with you eve(Am)ry single day
And (Dm)I just wanna tell you I (G)am [5 strums then stop]
 
[chorus]
So honey now (C)  (Am)    
(F) (G)Take me into your loving (C)arms (Am)    
(F) (G)Kiss me under the light of a (C)thousand (Am)stars
(F) (G)Place your head on my beating (C)heart (Am)
(F) I'm thinking (G)out loud
And maybe (Am)we (G)found (F)love (C)right (F)where (G)we (C)are
 
(C) And (Am)when my head's over gone and my (F)memory fades (G)
(C) (Am)And the crowds don't remember my (F)name (G)
(C) (Am)When my haaaands don't (F)play the strings the (G)same way
(C) (Am)I know you will still love me the (F)same (G)
 
Cause honey your (C)  (Am)soul could never (F)grow (G)old it's evergreen (C)  (Am)  (F)  (G)
And baby your (C) (Am)smile's forever in (F) my (G)mind and memory (C)  (Am)
(F) And I'm thinking (G)'bout how
 
(Dm)People fall in love in mys(G)terious (C)ways
And (Dm)maybe it's all part of a plan (G)
Well (Dm)I'll just keep on making the (Am) same mistakes
(Dm)Hoping that you'll under(G)stand [5 strums-stop]
 
[chorus]
So honey now (C)  (Am)    
(F) (G)Take me into your loving (C)arms (Am)    
(F) (G)Kiss me under the light of a (C)thousand (Am)stars
(F) (G)Place your head on my beating (C)heart (Am)
(F) I'm thinking (G)out loud
And maybe (Am)we (G)found (F)love (C)right (F)where (G)we (C)are
 
[interlude] (C)  (Am)  (F)  (G)  x4
 
[chorus]
So honey now (C)  (Am)    
(F) (G)Take me into your loving (C)arms (Am)    
(F) (G)Kiss me under the light of a (C)thousand (Am)stars
(F) (G)Place your head on my beating (C)heart (Am)
(F) I'm thinking (G)out loud
And maybe (Am)we (G)found (F)love (C)right (F)where (G)we (C)are x3  [end]
